name: Elena Voss
motivation: Uncover the truth about the murders and her own past
ambition: To help victims of corporate memory manipulation reclaim their identities
concrete_goal: Discover who has been editing her memories and why, while solving the murder case
conflict: Her commitment to truth conflicts with the terrifying reality that the truth makes her a murderer
epiphany: Identity isn't about erasing the past but integrating all parts of yourself, even the dark ones
arc: From fragmented denial to integrated acceptance

physical_description.distinctive_features: Small scar above left eyebrow, neural implant port behind right ear, callused fingers

mannerisms.speech: Speaks softly but precisely, technical jargon mixed with street slang
mannerisms.habits: Touches implant port when stressed, compulsively records everything after First Disaster
mannerisms.tics: Left hand tremor when Wraith is close to surfacing

backstory.as_wraith: Corporate assassin for 8 years, witnessed corruption, agreed to testify
backstory.as_elena: Woke 5 years ago with fabricated memories, drawn to memory recovery work
